text: Sri Ramakrishna Vijayam is an Indian Tamil language monthly magazine. It is published by Sri Ramakrishna Math, Chennai. It contains spiritual articles and picture stories for kids and students. This magazine is the oldest one in Tamil language. It is available from the year 1921. This magazine conducts competitions for students every year. ==References== Category:1921 establishments in Asia Category:Monthly magazines Category:1920s establishments in India
title: Sri Ramakrishna Vijayam (magazine)
